name: Riverside Pediatrics Clinic
description: Riverside Pediatrics Clinic is the pediatric clinic where Marcus works, known for its warm atmosphere and family-focused care.

name: Dr. Emily Foster
description: Dr. Emily Foster works alongside Marcus at the clinic, sharing patient duties and supporting pediatric care.

name: Nurse Sarah Lee
description: Nurse Sarah Lee works alongside Marcus at the clinic, sharing patient duties and supporting pediatric care.

name: Tom Johnson
description: Tom Johnson manages scheduling, records, and front-desk operations at Marcus’s clinic with dependable efficiency.

name: Alex Chen
description: Alex Chen is Marcus's teenage son, active in school and sports, often the center of Marcus’s weekend plans.

name: Coach Ryan Walker
description: Coach Ryan Walker coaches Alex’s soccer team, coordinating games that Marcus attends or volunteers for on weekends.

name: Grace Chen
description: Grace Chen is Marcus’s daughter, balancing band practice and schoolwork, and a frequent presence in his emails.

name: Ms. Abigail Green
description: Ms. Abigail Green directs Grace’s school band, often in touch with Marcus about upcoming performances or fundraisers.

name: Linda Chen
description: Linda Chen is Marcus’s supportive partner and co-planner for all things family, from road trips to school meetings.

name: Dr. Maria Gonzales
description: Dr. Maria Gonzales is Marcus’s own doctor, handling his general checkups and medical questions with mutual respect.

name: Twin Cities HVAC Services
description: Twin Cities HVAC Services provides reliable HVAC maintenance to the Chen household, especially important during Minnesota winters.

name: Amy Johnson
description: Amy Johnson lives near Marcus and often joins in block gatherings or helps with neighborhood coordination.

name: Mark Johnson
description: Mark Johnson lives near Marcus and often joins in block gatherings or helps with neighborhood coordination.

name: Dr. Alan Baker
description: Dr. Alan Baker is the family dentist Marcus trusts for regular cleanings and dental care for his kids.

name: Voyageur Cabins
description: Voyageur Cabins is a favorite retreat for the Chen family, offering peaceful lakeside escapes during summer breaks.

name: Valvoline Maple Grove
description: Valvoline Maple Grove is where Marcus brings the family car for oil changes and inspections during his day off.

name: Lakeview PTA Board
description: Lakeview PTA Board is the local school parent board that Marcus occasionally supports through meetings or fundraisers.

name: VisionWorks Plymouth
description: VisionWorks Plymouth handles the family’s vision needs, including annual checkups and prescription updates.

name: Dr. Helen Shafer
description: Dr. Helen Shafer is the dermatologist Marcus visits for routine skin health checks and seasonal concerns.

name: Elm Creek Volunteer Org
description: Elm Creek Volunteer Org coordinates local volunteering events Marcus sometimes joins with his kids to give back to the community.

name: Dr. Kevin Wu
description: Dr. Kevin Wu is a longtime friend from medical school whom Marcus occasionally meets for coffee or advice.

name: Maple Grove Salon
description: Maple Grove Salon is Marcus’s go-to spot for quick trims and family haircuts before big holidays or events.

name: Cafe Lurcat
description: Cafe Lurcat is a quiet downtown favorite Marcus and Linda visit for date nights or anniversary dinners.
